comment: Data extracted for FPG and HOMA-IR at 4 weeks.
comment_detailed: I identified the randomized, double‑blind, placebo‑controlled design and extracted exposure labels. Outcomes were taken from Table 3, which reports baseline and week 4 means ± SD for FPG and HOMA‑IR in both groups. HbA1c was not reported, so omitted. Study ID was not provided, so set null. Units were taken from the table; HOMA‑IR is unitless. Missing fields: study_metadata.study_id.
evidence: Table 3 shows FPG 133.9±52.2 (resveratrol) vs 136.6±50.0 (placebo) at baseline and 129.5±56.2 vs 122.5±53.1 at week 4.
Table 3 lists HOMA‑IR 4.3±2.5 vs 4.1±2.5 at baseline and 4.0±2.0 vs 3.4±1.7 at week 4.
